column4: Anyone know if there's a way to disable Compiz/Beryl from the command line? I'm attempting to connect to a remote machine using VNC, and it seems as though VNC doesn't update the client if desktop effects are running
thanks Rodya  and Brucevdk, I'll try those
there's a #compiz-fusion channel on this server too
ah ok, if this doesn't work I'll go hassle them :)
